page.title: 14MY SPECIAL DAY
page.content: Sunday morning I usually wake at 9am and get dressed. I then go into the dining room for breakfast - cheese on toast, an egg, rice crispies and a cup of tea. After breakfast I go to church with my sister. We worship with grown ups for about twenty minutes then we go to our Sunday Schol lessons. there are two groups in sunday School - children 2yrs - 7 yrs and 8yrs - 11yrs. Today I must rush home from church. My dad has bought me a desk from MFI and I am going to help him assemble it and fit it in my bedroom. I am having a portable television and a new bookcase - this means that I can watch my programes without interfering with family viewing. I do not spend all my free time watching TV. I also enjoy reading my favourite books are adventure stories.
